trans-unit.source: Provides a text box adapter class for the XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 介面卡集合中提供的文字方塊配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The control adapters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices.
trans-unit.target: 中的控制項配接器<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters>命名空間提供 XHTML 轉譯和處理上各種不同顯示裝置的行動控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlTextBoxAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlTextBoxAdapter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回相關聯控制項的強型別的參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called after an object, such as a form or a page, is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的物件後，例如表單或頁面中，會初始化。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <xref:System.EventArgs>) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 物件 (由<xref:System.EventArgs>)，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Displays the associated control and all of its child controls on the client.
trans-unit.target: 顯示相關聯的控制項及其所有子控制項的用戶端上。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>用來呈現伺服器控制項內容的用戶端瀏覽器上的物件。

trans-unit.source: Renders hidden field text for a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現隱藏欄位文字控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>物件。
